text: Crazy time to be alive, can't believe this is happening
How can I get in the private beta!!! :smile:

Hi! It’s now in public beta, you can check out the API docs here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/workflows>. These API are available now to use (though we’ll still be making some changes to them until we get to the final release)

:wave: Hi everyone and welcome to the public beta of the Automation CRUD API v4! :tada:  We are planning to do multiple beta releases until we’re ready for GA, but wanted to give everyone early access and an opportunity to share early feedback.

Please use this channel to ask questions + share feedback with the team. <@U060JS28BNJ>, <@U074MKFF01M>, and myself will do our best to respond to your messages in a timely manner. — To learn more, view the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/new-beta-version-of-the-automation-api-released|changelog>. To start using the API, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/workflows|check out the docs>.

Note that this channel is not for any questions/feedback related to the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|custom workflow actions API> (which is a separate API) or general workflows support (you can use <#C019VT42R8X|workflows> for that). Thank you! :HubSpot:
